statements.sql: select `admin_has_roles`.`admin_id` from `admin_has_roles` inner join `admin_role_permissions` on `admin_has_roles`.`admin_role_id` = `admin_role_permissions`.`admin_role_id` inner join `admin_role_has_permissions` on `admin_role_permissions`.`id` = `admin_role_has_permissions`.`admin_role_permission_id` where `admin_role_has_permissions`.`route` in ('admin.mobile.topup.index', 'admin.mobile.topup.pending', 'admin.mobile.topup.processing', 'admin.mobile.topup.complete', 'admin.mobile.topup.canceled', 'admin.mobile.topup.details', 'admin.mobile.topup.approved', 'admin.mobile.topup.rejected', 'admin.mobile.topup.export.data')
select * from `admin_roles` where `name` = 'Super Admin' and `status` = 1 limit 1
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'admin_notifications'

insert into `admin_notifications` (`type`, `admin_id`, `message`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('MOBILE-TOPUP', 1, '{\"type\":\"MOBILE-TOPUP\",\"title\":\"Mobile topup request successful (USER)\",\"message\":\"Transaction ID : MP29467848,Request Amount : 500.00 NGN,Operator Name : Airtel Nigeria,Mobile Number : 23407083838172,Total Payable Amount : 0.63 USD (iheonu6@gmail.com)\",\"image\":\"http:\/\/localhost:8000\/backend\/images\/default\/profile-default.webp\"}', '2025-05-31 02:12:30', '2025-05-31 02:12:30')
